FORM_SECTION.HELP:
Here you can configure SuperProductivity to list uncompleted CalDav todos for a specific project in the task creation panel in the daily planning view. They will be listed as suggestions and will provide a link to the todo as well as more information about it.

In addition you can automatically add and sync all uncompleted todos to your task backlog.

To make it work for nextcloud in the webapp, you might need to whitelist "https://app.super-productivity.com" via the nextcloud app webapppassword.
FORM_SECTION.TITLE: CalDav

HELP_ARR.P1_1: Please provide a login name (can be found on your profile page) and an API token or password if you can't generate one for some reason. Please not that newer versions of Jira sometimes only work with the token.
HELP_ARR.P1_2: You also need to specify a JQL query which is used for the suggestions to add tasks from Jira. If you need help check out this link https://confluence.atlassian.com/jirasoftwarecloud/advanced-searching-764478330.html.
HELP_ARR.P1_3: You can also configure, if you want to automatically (e.g. every time you visit the planning view), to import all new issues specified by a custom JQL query.
HELP_ARR.P1_4: Another option is "Check if current ticket is assigned to current user". If enabled and you're starting, a check will be made if you're currently assigned to that ticket on Jira, if not an Dialog appears in which you can chose to assign the ticket to yourself.
HELP_ARR.P2_1: There are several options to determine when and how you want to submit a worklog. Enabling 'Open worklog dialog for adding a worklog to Jira when task is done' opens a dialog to add an worklog every time you mark a Jira Task as done. So keep in mind that worklogs will be added on top of everything tracked so far. So if you mark a task as done for a second time, you might not want to submit the complete worked time for the task again.
HELP_ARR.P2_2: 'Open worklog dialog when sub task is done and not for tasks with sub tasks themselves' opens a worklog dialog every time when you mark a sub task of a Jira issue as done. Because you already track your time via the sub tasks, no dialog is opened once you mark the Jira task itself as done.
HELP_ARR.P2_3: 'Send updates to worklog automatically without dialog' does what it says. Because marking a task as done several times leads to the whole worked time being tracked twice, this is not recommended.
HELP_ARR.P3_1: Here you can reconfigure your default transitions. Jira enables a wide configuration of transitions usually coming into action as different columns on your Jira agile board we can't make assumptions about where and when to transition your tasks and you need to set it manually.

EVAL_FORM.HELP_P1: 花時間進行自我評估！此處的答案已儲存，併為您提供有關如何在指標部分工作的一些統計資料。此外，對明天的建議將在第二天出現在您的任務列表上方。
EVAL_FORM.HELP_P2: 這不僅僅是為了計算精確的指標，或是提高效率，而是為了改善您對工作的看法。評估日常生活中的自己的不足可能會對進步有所幫助。對它的清晰認識有助於更好地掌握這些並改善你的能力。

COMP.INTRO: People with high procrastination levels usually have low self-compassion. So practice it! It improves your feeling of self-worth, fosters positive emotions and can help you overcome procrastination, of course. Try a little exercise:
COMP.L1: Sit down for bit and stretch yourself, if you like, calm down a little bit
COMP.L2: Try to listen to the thoughts and feelings that arise
COMP.L3: Are you responding to yourself in a way that you would respond to a friend?
COMP.L4: If the answer is no, imagine your friend in your situation. What you would say to them? What you would do for them?
COMP.OUTRO: More exercises can be found here or on google.
COMP.TITLE: Self Compassion

CUR.INTRO: Isn't procrastination interesting? It doesn't seem to make any sense to do it, since it is not in your long term interest at all. But still everybody does. It helps a lot explore und gain a better understanding on how it works for you personally! Some basic questions to ask yourself could be:
CUR.L1: What feelings are eliciting your temptation to procrastinate?
CUR.L2: Where do you feel them in your body?
CUR.L3: What do they remind you of?
CUR.L4: What happens to the thought of procrastinating as you observe it? Does it intensify? Dissipate? Cause other emotions to arise?
CUR.L5: How are the sensations in your body shifting as you continue to rest your awareness on them?
CUR.PROCRASTINATION_TRIGGERS_TEXT: Another very effective method is to record, what triggered your urge to procrastinate. For example I personally often have the urge to quickly jump to reddit or my favorite news site whenever my browser window comes into focus. Since I started writing down my triggers in a simple empty text document, I became aware of how ingrained this pattern was and it helped me to experiment with different counter measures.
CUR.TITLE: Curiosity

INTRO.STRESSED: 因無法完成任務而感到壓力
INTRO.TITLE: 簡介

PROCRASTINATION.P1: First of all: Relax! Everybody does procrastinate once in a while. And if you're not doing what you should, you should at least enjoy it!
PROCRASTINATION.P2: Remember: Procrastination is an emotion regulation problem, not a time management problem. This means beating yourself up is not the solution, it is part of the problem. Let that sink in and then check the other tabs here for some further help.

REFRAME.INTRO: Think about what might be positive about the task despite its flaws.
REFRAME.TITLE: Reframing
REFRAME.TL1: What might be interesting about it?
REFRAME.TL2: What is to gain if you complete it?
REFRAME.TL3: How will you feel about it if you complete it?

SPLIT_UP.INTRO: Split up the task into as many small chunks as you can.
SPLIT_UP.OUTRO: Done? Then think about it. What would be – strictly theoretical – the first thing you would do if you were to start working on the task? Just think about it...
SPLIT_UP.TITLE: Split it up!

D_INITIAL.TEXT:
The Schedule should provide you with a better picture of how one's planned tasks play out over time. It is automatically generated from your Tasks and requires only time estimates on them to work.

Two things are distinguished: Scheduled Tasks, which are shown at their planned time and Regular Tasks, which should flow around those fixed events.

If you provide a work start and end time (recommended) regular tasks will never show up outside of these boundaries.
D_INITIAL.TITLE: 時間軸

A.ARCHIVE_ONLY_UPLOADED: 您的數據僅部分上傳。請稍後再試！否則，您將無法將數據同步到其他設備。
A.POSSIBLE_LEGACY_DATA: Super Productivity 現在使用兩個獨立的文件而不是單個文件來改進同步，這樣可以減少數據傳輸量。建議更新所有 Super Productivity 實例，並首先從數據最新的應用實例同步數據。如果這是您本地設備中的數據，則請忽略此警告，並通過確認下一個對話框來繼續上傳。
A.REMOTE_MODEL_VERSION_NEWER: The remote model version is newer than the local one. Please update your local app to the newest version!

C.EMPTY_SYNC: 您正在嘗試同步一個空的資料對象。這是您（幾乎）原始應用程式的第一次同步嗎？
C.FORCE_UPLOAD_AFTER_ERROR: 上傳本地資料時發生錯誤。嘗試強制更新？
C.MIGRATE_LEGACY: Legacy data detected while importing, do you want to try to migrate it?
C.NO_REMOTE_DATA: 找不到遠端資料。本地上傳到遠端嗎？
C.TRY_LOAD_REMOTE_AGAIN: 嘗試再次從遠端重新載入資料？
C.UNABLE_TO_LOAD_REMOTE_DATA: 無法從遠端加載數據。您想嘗試用本地數據覆蓋遠端數據嗎？此過程將導致所有遠端數據丟失。

D_AUTH_CODE.FOLLOW_LINK: Please open the following link and copy the auth code provided there into the input field below.
D_AUTH_CODE.TITLE: Login: {{provider}}

D_CONFLICT.TEXT: 已從遠端存取更新。本地和遠端資料似乎都被修改。
D_CONFLICT.TITLE: Sync：衝突資料
D_CONFLICT.OVERWRITE_WARNING: WARNING: The {{targetName}} data contains approximately {{targetChanges}} changes while the {{sourceName}} data only has {{sourceChanges}} changes. Are you sure you want to overwrite the {{targetName}} data with the {{sourceName}} version? This action cannot be undone.

D_DECRYPT_ERROR.P1: Your remote data is encrypted and decryption failed. Please enter the correct password!
D_DECRYPT_ERROR.P2: Or you can also change your password, which will overwrite all remote data.

D_INCOMPLETE_SYNC.P1: The remote sync data is incoherent!
D_INCOMPLETE_SYNC.P4: 1. Go to your other device and attempt do a complete sync there.
D_INCOMPLETE_SYNC.P5: 2. Overwrite the remote data with your local data. All remote changes will be lost!
D_INCOMPLETE_SYNC.P6: Creating a backup of the data you overwrite is recommended!!!
D_INCOMPLETE_SYNC.T2: Your archive data was not properly uploaded during last sync:
D_INCOMPLETE_SYNC.T4: 1. Go to your other device and complete the sync there.
D_INCOMPLETE_SYNC.T5:
2. Or you can overwrite the remote data with your local one. All remote changes will
    be lost!
D_INCOMPLETE_SYNC.T6: Creating a backup of the data you overwrite is recommended!!!

D_PERMISSION.TEXT: Your file permission for local syncing has been revoked.
D_PERMISSION.TITLE: Sync: Local file permission denied

DROPBOX.L_ACCESS_TOKEN: 存取權杖（從身份驗證代碼生成）

FORM.L_ENABLE_ENCRYPTION: Enable end-to-end encryption (experimental) – Make your data inaccessible for your sync provider
FORM.L_ENCRYPTION_NOTES: IMPORTANT NOTES: You will need to set the same password on your other devices BEFORE the next sync for everything to work. Please select a password that is secure. Please also note that you will NOT be able to access your data, if you forget this password. There is NO recovery possible, since only you have the key. The encryption will probably be good enough to thwart of most attackers, but there is no guarantee.
FORM.TITLE: 同步

WEB_DAV.CORS_INFO: 實驗！！為了完成這項工作，您需要為Nextcloud實例停用或限制CORS，這可能會對安全性造成負面影響！請參考該Issue以獲取更多資訊。使此功能在移動設備上起作用的一種方法是通過nextcloud應用程序webapppassword 將 "https://app.super-roductivity.com"列入白名單使用風險自負！
WEB_DAV.INFO: WebDAV implementations differ wildly unfortunately. Super Productivity is known to work well with Nextcloud, but it might not work with your provider.

S.ALREADY_IN_SYNC_NO_LOCAL_CHANGES: No local changes – Already in sync
S.ERROR_CORS:
WebDAV Sync Error: Network request failed.

This might be a CORS issue. Please ensure:
• Your WebDAV server allows Cross-Origin requests
• The server URL is correct and accessible
• You have a working internet connection
S.ERROR_DATA_IS_CURRENTLY_WRITTEN: Remote Data is currently being written
S.ERROR_FALLBACK_TO_BACKUP: 匯入資料時發生錯誤了。回到本地備份。
S.ERROR_INVALID_DATA: 同步時發生錯誤。無效資料
S.ERROR_NO_REV: No valid rev for remote file
S.ERROR_UNABLE_TO_READ_REMOTE_DATA: Error while syncing. Unable to read remote data. Maybe you enabled encryption and your local password does not match the one used to encrypt the remote data?
S.INCOMPLETE_CFG: Authentication for sync failed. Please check your Config!
S.UPLOAD_ERROR: 未知的上傳錯誤（設置正確嗎？）： {{err}}

SAFETY_BACKUP.TITLE: Sync Safety Backups
SAFETY_BACKUP.DESCRIPTION: Automatic backups are created before downloading data from remote during sync operations. Backups are organized in 4 smart slots: 2 most recent, 1 first from today, and 1 first from a day before today.
SAFETY_BACKUP.NO_BACKUPS: No safety backups available yet. Backups are created automatically before sync operations.
SAFETY_BACKUP.TOOLTIP_CREATE_MANUAL: Create a manual backup of all your data
SAFETY_BACKUP.TOOLTIP_RESTORE: Restore this backup (will replace all current data)
SAFETY_BACKUP.RESTORE_CONFIRM_MSG:
Are you sure you want to restore the backup from {{timestamp}}?

This will COMPLETELY REPLACE all your current data!

Reason: {{reason}}

Click OK to proceed or Cancel to abort.

D_CONFIRM_MOVE_TO_PROJECT.MSG: There are {{tasksNr}} instances created for this repeatable task. Do you want to move all of them to the project "{{projectName}}"?

D_CONFIRM_REMOVE.MSG: 刪除重複配置會將此任務的所有先前實例轉換為常規任務，是否繼續？

D_DELETE_INSTANCE.MSG: Remove the repeat task instance on {{date}}? This will prevent the task from being created on this date only.

D_CONFIRM_UPDATE_INSTANCES.MSG: There are {{tasksNr}} instances created for this repeatable task. Do you want to update all of them with the new defaults or just future tasks?

D_EDIT.HELP1: 重複任務適用於日常瑣事，例如："每日會議"，"代碼審查"，"檢查電子郵件"或可能一次又一次發生的類似任務。
D_EDIT.HELP2: 配置完成後，一旦打開項目，將在選擇的每一天重新建立重複任務，併在一天結束時自動標記為已完成。它們將作為不同的實例處理。所以你可以自由添加子任務等。
D_EDIT.HELP3: 從 Jira 或 Git Issue 匯入的任務不能重複。
D_EDIT.HELP4: A note about the order field: Referring to the creation order repeatable tasks. Only in effect for repeatable tasks that are created at the same time. A lower value means a task will be higher up the list, a higher number that it will be further down. A value greater than 0 means items are created at the bottom of normal tasks.

F.ORDER_DESCRIPTION: Creation order of repeatable tasks. Only affects repeatable tasks created at the same time. A lower value means a task will be created higher up the list, a higher number that it will be further down. A value greater than 0 means items are created at the bottom of normal tasks.
F.START_TIME_DESCRIPTION: E.g. 15:00. Leave blank for an all day task
F.TITLE: 任務標題
F.INHERIT_SUBTASKS_DESCRIPTION: When enabled, subtasks from the most recent task instance will be recreated with the repeating task
F.DISABLE_AUTO_UPDATE_SUBTASKS_DESCRIPTION: Do not update inherited subtasks automatically when the newest instance changes

D_IDLE.WARN_SIMPLE_COUNTER: Time will be counted towards the activated simple counter buttons.
D_IDLE.WARN_SIMPLE_COUNTER_BREAK: Time will STILL be counted on the activated simple counter buttons.
